name: BloodPressureDeviceCuffSizeReferenceSet
title: Blood pressure device cuff size reference set
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: Blood pressure device cuff size value set as defined by the Clinical Information Modeling Initiative.),(Data Element Scope: This reference set contains concepts used to result the size of a blood pressure cuff used during a blood pressure measurement, referencing the SNOMED Code 722471002 "Size of blood pressure cuff (observable entity)" and the LOINC term "Blood pressure device Cuff size" 8358-4, resulting the SNOMED CT concept: [Blood pressure device cuff size reference set 1481000205107]),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set is missing 10 concept from the HSPC extension namespace: [Blood pressure cuff, ankle type (physical object)	8741000205104], [Blood pressure cuff, extra large adult thigh cuff (physical object)	8731000205109], [Blood pressure cuff, infant size 8861000205108], [Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 1 8841000205107], [Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 2 8851000205105], [Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 3 8821000205104], [Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 4 8811000205106], [Blood pressure cuff, neonatal size 5 8801000205109], [Blood pressure cuff, adult size medium (physical object) 24811000205108], 
[Blood pressure cuff, upper arm, adult size universal (physical object) 24821000205101].),(Exclusion Criteria: )
